title: Thought of love (1969) Italian Film | Can true love transcend the limits of time and fate?

sources.title: Thought of love (1969) Italian Film | Can true love transcend the limits of time and fate?
sources.description:
Elena and Marco fall into a whirlwind romance, but their dreams are shattered by betrayal and unforeseen tragedy. As years pass, they cross paths once more, grappling with old wounds and a burning question: can love survive the choices that tore them apart?

Original title: Pensiero d'amore (1969) 

Director: Mario Amendola
Writers: Mario Amendola, Bruno Corbucci
Stars: Mal, Silvia Dionisio, Pippo Franco
Genre: Italian cinema, Musical, Romance
